name: Mushroom Kid Demo
description: ATTENTION! IF THE GAME IS ACTING WONKY SIMPLY RELOAD THE SITE. Hey everyone, thanks for the mountain of support I've received so far for this project! It's no where near done but I'll be working on it until we're all satisfied! There will be multiple paths throughout the game, including two end goals here. The game is a black and white retro platformer with constant motion starring Mushroom Kid! Make sure you check out my page for links to my Twitter and YouTube accounts to get more frequent updates. If you'd like to help me out by donating it would mean the world to me as I'm working on a lot of projects. Lastly, please leave comments on anything related to the game, I'd love to read them and interact!
